text: Take Aim () is a 1974 Soviet drama movie directed by Igor TalankinВЫБОР ЦЕЛИ and stars Sergei Bondarchuk, Georgiy Zhzhonov, and Nikolai Volkov. ==Actors== *Sergei Bondarchuk – Igor Kurchatov *Georgiy Zhzhonov – Vitaly Petrovich Zubavin *Nikolai Volkov – Abram Ioffe *Irina Skobtseva – Marina Dmitriyevna Kurchatova *Nikolai Burlyayev – Fedya *Alla Pokrovskaya – Tanya *Yakov Tripolsky – Joseph Stalin *Mikhail Ulyanov – Georgy Zhukov == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1974 drama movies Category:Soviet drama movies Category:Movies directed by Igor Talankin
title: Take Aim
